verses.verse: אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רְאוּבֵ֤ן <S%H7205><s%> Reuben שִׁמְעוֹן֙ <S%H8095><s%> Simeon לֵוִ֣י <S%H3878><s%> Levi וִיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah יִשָׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> Issachar וּזְבֻלֽוּן׃ <S%H2074><s%> and Zebulun
דָּ֚ן <S%H1835><s%> Dan יוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin נַפְתָּלִ֖י <S%H5321><s%> Naphtali גָּ֥ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad וְאָשֵֽׁר׃ <S%H836><s%> and Asher ס

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עֵ֤ר <S%H6147><s%> Er וְאוֹנָן֙ <S%H209><s%> and Onan וְשֵׁלָ֔ה <S%H7956><s%> and Shelah שְׁלוֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> [which] three נ֣וֹלַד <S%H3205><s%> were born ל֔וֹ מִבַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> unto him of the daughter שׁ֖וּעַ <S%H7774><s%> Shua הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑ית <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanitess וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become עֵ֣ר ׀ <S%H6147><s%> And Er בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah רַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> was evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God וַיְמִיתֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> and he slew ס

וְתָמָר֙ <S%H8559><s%> And Tamar כַּלָּת֔וֹ <S%H3618><s%> his daughter in law יָ֥לְדָה <S%H3205><s%> bare לּ֖וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פֶּ֣רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> him Pharez וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זָ֑רַח <S%H2226><s%> and Zerah כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> All the sons יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah חֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> [were] five ס
בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> The sons פֶ֖רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> of Pharez חֶצְר֥וֹן <S%H2696><s%> Hezron וְחָמֽוּל׃ <S%H2538><s%> and Hamul ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons זֶ֗רַח <S%H2226><s%> of Zerah זִ֠מְרִי <S%H2174><s%> Zimri וְאֵיתָ֧ן <S%H387><s%> and Ethan וְהֵימָ֛ן <S%H1968><s%> and Heman וְכַלְכֹּ֥ל <S%H3633><s%> and Calcol וָדָ֖רַע <S%H1873><s%> and Dara כֻּלָּ֥ם <S%H3605><s%> all חֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H2568><s%> five ס

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons כַּרְמִ֑י <S%H3756><s%> of Carmi עָכָר֙ <S%H5917><s%> Achar עוֹכֵ֣ר <S%H5916><s%> the troubler יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who מָעַ֖ל <S%H4603><s%> who transgressed בַּחֵֽרֶם׃ <S%H2764><s%> in the thing accursed ס
וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אֵיתָ֖ן <S%H387><s%> of Ethan עֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <S%H5838><s%> Azariah

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> The sons חֶצְר֖וֹן <S%H2696><s%> also of Hezron אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who נוֹלַד־ <S%H3205><s%> that were born ל֑וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרַחְמְאֵ֥ל <S%H3396><s%> unto him Jerahmeel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָ֖ם <S%H7410><s%> and Ram וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּלוּבָֽי׃ <S%H3621><s%> and Chelubai

וְרָ֖ם <S%H7410><s%> And Ram הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּינָדָ֑ב <S%H5992><s%> Amminadab וְעַמִּינָדָב֙ <S%H5992><s%> and Amminadab הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H5177><s%> Nahshon נְשִׂ֖יא <S%H5387><s%> prince בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וְנַחְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H5177><s%> And Nahshon הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׂלְמָ֔א <S%H8007><s%> Salma וְשַׂלְמָ֖א <S%H8007><s%> and Salma הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֹּֽעַז׃ <S%H1162><s%> Boaz

וּבֹ֙עַז֙ <S%H1162><s%> And Boaz הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עוֹבֵ֔ד <S%H5744><s%> Obed וְעוֹבֵ֖ד <S%H5744><s%> and Obed הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשָֽׁי׃ <S%H3448><s%> Jesse

וְאִישַׁ֛י <S%H3448><s%> And Jesse הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּכֹר֖וֹ <S%H1060><s%> his firstborn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלִיאָ֑ב <S%H446><s%> Eliab וַאֲבִינָדָב֙ <S%H41><s%> and Abinadab הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the second וְשִׁמְעָ֖א <S%H8092><s%> and Shimma הַשְּׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> the third
נְתַנְאֵל֙ <S%H5417><s%> Nethaneel הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> the fourth רַדַּ֖י <S%H7288><s%> Raddai הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H2549><s%> the fifth
אֹ֚צֶם <S%H684><s%> Ozem הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> the sixth דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> David הַשְּׁבִעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> the seventh

[וְאַחְיֹתֵיהֶם כ] (וְאַחְיֹותֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H269><s%> other ק) צְרוּיָ֣ה <S%H6870><s%> [were] Zeruiah וַאֲבִיגָ֑יִל <S%H26><s%> and Abigail וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons צְרוּיָ֗ה <S%H6870><s%> of Zeruiah אַבְשַׁ֛י <S%H52><s%> Abishai וְיוֹאָ֥ב <S%H3097><s%> and Joab וַעֲשָׂה־ אֵ֖ל <S%H6214><s%> and Asahel שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> three

וַאֲבִיגַ֕יִל <S%H26><s%> And Abigail יָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמָשָׂ֑א <S%H6021><s%> Amasa וַאֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> and the father עֲמָשָׂ֔א <S%H6021><s%> of Amasa יֶ֖תֶר <S%H3500><s%> [was] Jether הַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִֽי׃ <S%H3459><s%> the Ishmeelite

וְכָלֵ֣ב <S%H3612><s%> And Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֶצְר֗וֹן <S%H2696><s%> of Hezron הוֹלִ֛יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲזוּבָ֥ה <S%H5806><s%> Azubah אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> [his] wife וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> [children] of יְרִיע֑וֹת <S%H3408><s%> and of Jerioth וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and these בָנֶ֔יהָ <S%H1121><s%> her sons יֵ֥שֶׁר <S%H3475><s%> [are] these Jesher וְשׁוֹבָ֖ב <S%H7727><s%> and Shobab וְאַרְדּֽוֹן׃ <S%H715><s%> and Ardon

וַתָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> was dead עֲזוּבָ֑ה <S%H5806><s%> And when Azubah וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> took ל֤וֹ כָלֵב֙ <S%H3612><s%> Caleb אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶפְרָ֔ת <S%H672><s%> unto him Ephrath וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> which bare ל֖וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֽוּר׃ <S%H2354><s%> him Hur

וְחוּר֙ <S%H2354><s%> And Hur הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוּרִ֔י <S%H221><s%> Uri וְאוּרִ֖י <S%H221><s%> and Uri הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּצַלְאֵֽל׃ <S%H1212><s%> Bezaleel ס

וְאַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> And afterward בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> went in חֶצְרוֹן֙ <S%H2696><s%> Hezron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> to the daughter מָכִיר֙ <S%H4353><s%> of Machir אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father גִלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְקָחָ֔הּ <S%H3947><s%> whom he married וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <S%H8346><s%> when he [was] threescore שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and she bare ל֖וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂגֽוּב׃ <S%H7687><s%> him Segub

וּשְׂג֖וּב <S%H7687><s%> And Segub הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָאִ֑יר <S%H2971><s%> Jair וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> had ל֗וֹ עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וְשָׁלוֹשׁ֙ <S%H7969><s%> who had three עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> cities בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took גְּשֽׁוּר־ <S%H1650><s%> Geshur וַ֠אֲרָם <S%H758><s%> and Aram אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for חַוֹּ֨ת <S%H2333><s%> with the towns יָאִ֧יר <S%H2971><s%> of Jair מֵאִתָּ֛ם <S%H853><s%> אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with קְנָ֥ת <S%H7079><s%> from them with Kenath וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and the towns שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <S%H8346><s%> thereof [even] threescore עִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> cities כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> All these [belonged to] the sons מָכִ֥יר <S%H4353><s%> of Machir אֲבִי־ <S%H1><s%> the father גִלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead

וְאַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> And after מוֹת־ <S%H4194><s%> was dead חֶצְר֖וֹן <S%H2696><s%> that Hezron בְּכָלֵ֣ב אֶפְרָ֑תָה <S%H3613><s%> in Calebephratah וְאֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife חֶצְרוֹן֙ <S%H2696><s%> Hezron's אֲבִיָּ֔ה <S%H29><s%> then Abiah וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> bare ל֔וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַשְׁח֖וּר <S%H806><s%> him Ashur אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> the father תְקֽוֹעַ׃ <S%H8620><s%> of Tekoa

וַיִּהְי֧וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יְרַחְמְאֵ֛ל <S%H3396><s%> of Jerahmeel בְּכ֥וֹר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn חֶצְר֖וֹן <S%H2696><s%> of Hezron הַבְּכ֣וֹר ׀ <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn רָ֑ם <S%H7410><s%> were Ram וּבוּנָ֥ה <S%H946><s%> and Bunah וָאֹ֛רֶן <S%H767><s%> and Oren וָאֹ֖צֶם <S%H684><s%> and Ozem אֲחִיָּֽה׃ <S%H281><s%> [and] Ahijah

וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> had אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> wife אַחֶ֛רֶת <S%H312><s%> had also another לִֽירַחְמְאֵ֖ל <S%H3396><s%> Jerahmeel וּשְׁמָ֣הּ <S%H8034><s%> whose name עֲטָרָ֑ה <S%H5851><s%> [was] Atarah הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> she אֵ֥ם <S%H517><s%> she [was] the mother אוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H208><s%> of Onam ס

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons רָ֖ם <S%H7410><s%> of Ram בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn יְרַחְמְאֵ֑ל <S%H3396><s%> of Jerahmeel מַ֥עַץ <S%H4619><s%> were Maaz וְיָמִ֖ין <S%H3226><s%> and Jamin וָעֵֽקֶר׃ <S%H6134><s%> and Eker

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אוֹנָ֖ם <S%H208><s%> of Onam שַׁמַּ֣י <S%H8060><s%> were Shammai וְיָדָ֑ע <S%H3047><s%> and Jada וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons שַׁמַּ֔י <S%H8060><s%> of Shammai נָדָ֖ב <S%H5070><s%> Nadab וַאֲבִישֽׁוּר׃ <S%H51><s%> and Abishur

וְשֵׁ֛ם <S%H8034><s%> And the name אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> of the wife אֲבִישׁ֖וּר <S%H51><s%> of Abishur אֲבִיהָ֑יִל <S%H32><s%> [was] Abihail וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and she bare ל֔וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחְבָּ֖ן <S%H257><s%> him Ahban וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹלִֽיד׃ <S%H4140><s%> and Molid

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons נָדָ֖ב <S%H5070><s%> of Nadab סֶ֣לֶד <S%H5540><s%> Seled וְאַפָּ֑יִם <S%H649><s%> and Appaim וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> died סֶ֖לֶד <S%H5540><s%> but Seled לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without בָנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> without children ס

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אַפַּ֖יִם <S%H649><s%> of Appaim יִשְׁעִ֑י <S%H3469><s%> Ishi וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יִשְׁעִי֙ <S%H3469><s%> of Ishi שֵׁשָׁ֔ן <S%H8348><s%> Sheshan וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the children שֵׁשָׁ֖ן <S%H8348><s%> of Sheshan אַחְלָֽי׃ <S%H304><s%> Ahlai

וּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יָדָע֙ <S%H3047><s%> of Jada אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> the brother שַׁמַּ֔י <S%H8060><s%> of Shammai יֶ֖תֶר <S%H3500><s%> Jether וְיוֹנָתָ֑ן <S%H3129><s%> and Jonathan וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> died יֶ֖תֶר <S%H3500><s%> and Jether לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without בָנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> without children ס

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3129><s%> of Jonathan פֶּ֣לֶת <S%H6431><s%> Peleth וְזָזָ֑א <S%H2117><s%> and Zaza אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> These were the sons יְרַחְמְאֵֽל׃ <S%H3396><s%> of Jerahmeel

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> had לְשֵׁשָׁ֛ן <S%H8348><s%> Now Sheshan בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> had no sons כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo בָּנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> but daughters וּלְשֵׁשָׁ֛ן <S%H8348><s%> And Sheshan עֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> had a servant מִצְרִ֖י <S%H4713><s%> an Egyptian וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name יַרְחָֽע׃ <S%H3398><s%> [was] Jarha

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave שֵׁשָׁ֧ן <S%H8348><s%> And Sheshan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּתּ֛וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter לְיַרְחָ֥ע <S%H3398><s%> to Jarha עַבְדּ֖וֹ <S%H5650><s%> his servant לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> to wife וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and she bare ל֖וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַתָּֽי׃ <S%H6262><s%> him Attai

וְעַתַּי֙ <S%H6262><s%> And Attai הֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָתָ֔ן <S%H5416><s%> Nathan וְנָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> and Nathan הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זָבָֽד׃ <S%H2066><s%> Zabad

וְזָבָד֙ <S%H2066><s%> And Zabad הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶפְלָ֔ל <S%H654><s%> Ephlal וְאֶפְלָ֖ל <S%H654><s%> and Ephlal הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עוֹבֵֽד׃ <S%H5744><s%> Obed
